| country = India language = Telugu budget =
}} 'Challenge' () is a 1984 Telugu film directed by A. Kodandarami Reddy. It
stars Chiranjeevi, Rao Gopal Rao, Suhasini Mani Ratnam, and Vijayashanti in the
lead roles. Maestro Ilayaraja composed music for the film. This film is based on
fiction work by Yandamoori Virendranath titled "Dabbu to the power of Dabbu".
